recipe_name: Honey, garlic and red pepper dressing
author: James Tanner
method: Sweat down the red pepper and garlic in a hot pan for 2-3 minutes. Add the honey and then the hot water, simmer for about 1 minute. Blend the mixture and slowly add the olive oil to a smooth sauce consistency. Pass the dressing through a sieve, season and use.
ingredients: 1 red pepper, chopped,  2 garlic cloves, chopped,  4 tsp clear honey,  salt and pepper,  1 cup hot water,  olive oil, to blend
